page.title: 19SHOP PRICES IN ABERDEEN.
page.content: In the last ten years Aberdeen prices have shot up,which is okay for shop owners & landlords. But it isn't so good for people who don't work in the oil industry.Here is an example of supermarket prices. Apples 34p/lb,Baked beans 22p,Biscuits 30p,Butter 1/2 lb 43p,Chedder Cheese 99p/lb,Fresh Chicken Â£1.05/lb,2 litres Coke 75p,Electronic game Â£23.99,Grapes 69p/lb,Tin of Ham 95p,Hoover Â£94.95, Loaf bread 35p,Tin of Lager 34p,Hair Mousse 99p, New potatoes 23p/lb, Oxo Cubes 30p,Pears 30p/ lb,Rolled Brisket Â£1.74/lb,Rolled Shoulder of Pork Â£1.28/lb,Roast Duck Â£1.05/lb,Strawber- ries 45p/lb,Sherry 70cl Â£1.99,Scotch Silverside Â£1.99/lb,Steak & Kidney pie Â£1.14,Tomatoes 47p/lb,Vodka Â£6.25, Whisky Â£7.29,White Wine Â£3.99,Red Wine Â£1.95,1985 Escort Â£6684.90.
